verses.verse: And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Make <S%H6213><s%> thee <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2689>trumpets<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>; of beaten <S%H4749>work<s%> shalt thou <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H1961>them<s%>: and thou shalt use them for the <S%H4744>calling<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%>, and for the <S%H4550>journeying<s%> of the <S%H4264>camps<s%>.

And when they shall <S%H8628>blow<s%> <S%H2004>them<s%>, all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> shall <S%H3259>gather<s%> themselves unto thee at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>.

And if they <S%H8628>blow<s%> but <S%H259>one<s%>, then the <S%H5387>princes<s%>, the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, shall gather themselves unto <S%H3259>thee<s%>.
And when ye <S%H8628>blow<s%> an <S%H8643>alarm<s%>, the <S%H4264>camps<s%> that <S%H2583>lie<s%> on the east <S%H6924>side<s%> shall take their <S%H5265>journey<s%>.

And when ye <S%H8628>blow<s%> an <S%H8643>alarm<s%> the second <S%H8145>time<s%>, the <S%H4264>camps<s%> that <S%H2583>lie<s%> on the south <S%H8486>side<s%> shall take their <S%H5265>journey<s%>: they shall <S%H8628>blow<s%> an <S%H8643>alarm<s%> for their <S%H4550>journeys<s%>.
But when the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> is to be gathered <S%H6950>together<s%>, ye shall <S%H8628>blow<s%>, but ye shall not sound an <S%H7321>alarm<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, shall <S%H8628>blow<s%> the <S%H2689>trumpets<s%>; and they shall be to you for a <S%H2708>statute<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%>.

And when ye <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H4421>war<s%> in your <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H6862>against<s%> the adversary that <S%H6887>oppresseth<s%> <S%H7321>you<s%>, then ye shall sound an alarm with the <S%H2689>trumpets<s%>; and ye shall be <S%H2142>remembered<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, and ye shall be <S%H3467>saved<s%> from your <S%H341>enemies<s%>.

Also in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of your <S%H8057>gladness<s%>, and in your set <S%H4150>feasts<s%>, and in the <S%H7218>beginnings<s%> of your <S%H2320>months<s%>, ye shall <S%H8628>blow<s%> the <S%H2689>trumpets<s%> over your <S%H5930>burnt-offerings<s%>, and over the <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of your <S%H5930>peace-offerings<s%>; and they shall be to you for a <S%H2146>memorial<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>: I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.

And it came to pass in the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>, in the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>, on the <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> day of the <S%H6051>month<s%>, that the cloud was taken <S%H5927>up<s%> from over the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> set <S%H5265>forward<s%> according to their <S%H4550>journeys<s%> out of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai<s%>; and the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H7931>abode<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6290>Paran<s%>.
And they <S%H7223>first<s%> took their <S%H5265>journey<s%> according to the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

And in the <S%H7223>first<s%> place the <S%H1714>standard<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H5265>set<s%> forward according to their <S%H6635>hosts<s%>: and over his host was <S%H5177>Nahshon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5992>Amminadab<s%>.
And over the <S%H6635>host<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%> was <S%H5417>Nethanel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6686>Zuar<s%>.
And over the <S%H6635>host<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> was <S%H446>Eliab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2497>Helon<s%>.

And the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> was taken <S%H3381>down<s%>; and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1648>Gershon<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%>, who <S%H5375>bare<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>, set <S%H5265>forward<s%>.

And the <S%H1714>standard<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> set <S%H5265>forward<s%> according to their <S%H6635>hosts<s%>: and over his <S%H6635>host<s%> was <S%H468>Elizur<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7707>Shedeur<s%>.
And over the <S%H6635>host<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> was <S%H8017>Shelumiel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6701>Zurishaddai<s%>.
And over the <S%H6635>host<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> was <S%H460>Eliasaph<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1845>Deuel<s%>.

And the <S%H6956>Kohathites<s%> set <S%H5265>forward<s%>, <S%H5375>bearing<s%> the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%>: and the others did set <S%H6965>up<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> against their <S%H935>coming<s%>.

And the <S%H1714>standard<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> set <S%H5265>forward<s%> according to their <S%H6635>hosts<s%>: and over his <S%H6635>host<s%> was <S%H476>Elishama<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5989>Ammihud<s%>.
And over the <S%H6635>host<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> was <S%H1583>Gamaliel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6301>Pedahzur<s%>.
And over the <S%H6635>host<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> was <S%H27>Abidan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1441>Gideoni<s%>.

And the <S%H1714>standard<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%>, which was the <S%H622>rearward<s%> of all the <S%H4264>camps<s%>, set <S%H5265>forward<s%> according to their <S%H6635>hosts<s%>: and over his <S%H6635>host<s%> was <S%H295>Ahiezer<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5996>Ammishaddai<s%>.
And over the <S%H6635>host<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H836>Asher<s%> was <S%H6295>Pagiel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5918>Ochran<s%>.
And over the <S%H6635>host<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%> was <S%H299>Ahira<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5881>Enan<s%>.
Thus <S%H428>were<s%> the <S%H4550>journeyings<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> according to their <S%H6635>hosts<s%>; and they set <S%H5265>forward<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H2246>Hobab<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7467>Reuel<s%> the <S%H4084>Midianite<s%>, <S%H4872>Moses<s%>' <S%H2859>father-in<s%>-law, We are <S%H5265>journeying<s%> unto the <S%H4725>place<s%> of which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, I will <S%H5414>give<s%> it <S%H3212>you<s%>: come thou with <S%H2895>us<s%>, and we will do thee good; for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H2895>good<s%> concerning <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3212>him<s%>, I will not go; but I will <S%H3212>depart<s%> to mine own <S%H776>land<s%>, and to my <S%H4138>kindred<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H5800>Leave<s%> us <S%H3651>not<s%>, I pray thee; forasmuch as thou knowest how we are to <S%H2583>encamp<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, and thou shalt be to us instead of <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.
And it shall <S%H3212>be<s%>, if thou go with <S%H2896>us<s%>, yea, it shall be, that what good soever <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> shall <S%H3190>do<s%> unto <S%H2895>us<s%>, the same will we do unto thee.

And they set <S%H5265>forward<s%> from the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>' <S%H1870>journey<s%>; and the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H5265>went<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>' <S%H1870>journey<s%>, to seek <S%H8446>out<s%> a <S%H4496>resting-place<s%> for them.
And the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> was over them by <S%H3119>day<s%>, when they set <S%H5265>forward<s%> from the <S%H4264>camp<s%>.

And it came to <S%H727>pass<s%>, when the ark set <S%H5265>forward<s%>, that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Rise <S%H6965>up<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and let thine <S%H341>enemies<s%> be <S%H6327>scattered<s%>; and let them that <S%H8130>hate<s%> thee <S%H5127>flee<s%> before <S%H6440>thee<s%>.
And when it <S%H5117>rested<s%>, he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H7725>Return<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, unto the <S%H7233>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousands<s%> of the thousands of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
